types.html:
endéans

  1. (chiefly Belgium and Luxembourg) within a time interval, distance, or other limit
    Le Conseil arbitral statue endéans les trente jours de la saisine.
    The arbitration council makes a ruling within thirty days of the case submission.

Further reading

[edit]
  • “endéans”, in Trésor de la langue française informatisé [Digitized Treasury of the French Language], 2012.
trans: within a time interval, distance, or other limit

title: endéans
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ɑ̃.de.ɑ̃/
